Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO, T1.COD_PRODUTO, T1.VAL_OPERACAO, T1.SITUACAO, T1.CODUSU, T1.NUMREC, T1.SITCONTB, T1.DTMOVTO, T1.CODSVI, T2.DES_OPERACAO, T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO, T2.IND_TIPO_FUNCAO, T3.CGCCPF, T3.CLIFOR, T3.DCOIRF, T3.DCOINSS, T3.DCOISS, T3.CEP, T3.CIDADE, T3.NOME, T3.TPPESSOA, T4.COD_FUNCAO FROM seguros.v0histsini WHERE T1.OPERACAO = T2.COD_OPERACAO AND T4.COD_OPERACAO = T2.COD_OPERACAO AND T3.CLIFOR = T1.CODPSVI AND T4.IDE_SISTEMA = T2.IDE_SISTEMA AND T4.IDE_SISTEMA_OPER = T2.IDE_SISTEMA AND T1.DTMOVTO >= :SI9GW01.DATA-INICIAL AND T1.DTMOVTO <= :SI9GW01.DATA-FINAL AND T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA = :IDE_SISTEMA AND T3.TIPREG = :TIPREG AND T3.CODSVI_ISS IN (20, 92, 93) AND T4.COD_FUNCAO IN (2, 5, 6, 8, 12, 15, 16, 21, 22, 24, 25) AND T4.NUM_FATOR > 0 ORDER BY T1.DTMOVTO, T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO END SQL
